formalpara.title: Figure 5. EGF and Wnt signals cooperate to induce expression of Hox gene egl-5 in P12.p
formalpara.para: egl-5 inhibits mab-5 expression and is sufficient to establish P12.p fate. The sources of the ligands have not been established. Reprinted with permission from Jiang and Sternberg, 1998, Company of Biologists Ltd.
